name: Pediatric Clinic
description: This satellite pediatric clinic of San Francisco General Hospital provides medical services to children and adolescents. With a pediatrician and registered nurse practitioner. This program provides: - Immunizations; - Well child visits and urgent care; - Referrals to specialists; - Health Education.
fullDescription: This satellite pediatric clinic of San Francisco General Hospital provides medical services to children and adolescents. With a pediatrician and registered nurse practitioner. This program provides: - Immunizations; - Well child visits and urgent care; - Referrals to specialists; - Health Education.
whatTheyOffer: This satellite pediatric clinic of San Francisco General Hospital provides medical services to children and adolescents. With a pediatrician and registered nurse practitioner. This program provides: - Immunizations; - Well child visits and urgent care; - Referrals to specialists; - Health Education.
howToGetIt: For more information or to make a referral, call the Intake line at 415-594-8501 or email.
